headline: Legal Assistant at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)

positions.description:
â¢  Currently obtain a Security Clearance (investigation, credit check, and drug test completed in 2014)

â¢  Receive, screen, and direct phone calls/visitors
â¢  Sort/distribute  incoming mail

â¢  Prepare and file motions for the Government through the 5th Circuit
